uncc.objects

Class ISBN

  • java.lang.Object
    • uncc.objects.HSQLDatabaseObject
      • uncc.objects.ISBN
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class ISBN
extends HSQLDatabaseObject
    ISBN object used to store ISBN-10 and ISBN-13 representations of a uncc.objects.Book object's ISBN.
    Since:
    June 17th, 2015
    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    Christian Gibson
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • ISBN

        public ISBN(java.lang.String isbn)
        Constructor for the ISBN object.
        Parameters:
        isbn - A string representation of either an ISBN-10 or ISBN-13 value. Non-isbn characters (anything except 0-9 and 'X') are removed prior to processing. If the cleaned string is neither 10 nor 13 characters long, or the calculated checksum does not match the checksum included in the value, the constructor will throw an IllegalArguementException.

      • ISBN

        public ISBN(java.lang.String isbn10,
            java.lang.String isbn13)
        Constructor for the ISBN object.
        Parameters:
        isbn10 - A string representation of an ISBN-10 value. All non-isbn-10 characters (anything except 0-9 and 'X') are removed prior to processing. If the cleaned string is not 10 characters long, or the calculated checksum does not match the checksum included in the provided string, the constructor will throw an IllegalArguementException.
        isbn13 - A string representation of an ISBN-13 value. All non-isbn-13 characters (anything except 0-9) are removed prior to processing. If the cleaned string is not 13 characters long, or the calculated checksum does not match the checksum included in the provided string, the constructor will throw an IllegalArguementException.
        Throws:
        java.util.InputMismatchException - In the case that the provided isbn10 and isbn13 values, although valid in of themselves, are not representations of the same ISBN.

      • ISBN

        public ISBN(int isbn)
        Constructor for the ISBN object.
        Parameters:
        isbn - An integer representation of an isbn value. Coerced as a string and processed with ISBN(String isbn).

      • ISBN

        public ISBN(int isbn10,
            int isbn13)
        Constructor for the ISBN object.
        Parameters:
        isbn10 - An integer representation of an isbn10 value. Coerced as a string and processed with ISBN(String isbn10, String isbn13).
        isbn13 - An integer representation of an isbn13 value. Coerced as a string and processed with ISBN(String isbn10, String isbn13).

    • Method Detail

      • getISBN13

        public java.lang.String getISBN13()
        Returns:
        The ISBN-13 value stored by this object.

      • getISBN10

        public java.lang.String getISBN10()
        Returns:
        The ISBN-10 value stored by this object, if one exists, else null.

      • getOriginalISBN

        public java.lang.String getOriginalISBN()
        Returns:
        The ISBN used to initialize this object.

      • cleanISBN

        public static java.lang.String cleanISBN(java.lang.String isbn)
        Method that strips non-legal characters from a string.
        Parameters:
        isbn - The ISBN string to clean.
        Returns:
        The cleaned ISBN string.

      • validateISBN

        public static boolean validateISBN(java.lang.String isbn)
        Method that validates an ISBN.
        Parameters:
        isbn - The ISBN to validate.
        Returns:
        True if the ISBN is either a valid ISBN-13 or ISBN-10 value, False otherwise.

      • validateISBN10

        public static boolean validateISBN10(java.lang.String isbn)
        Parameters:
        isbn - A string representation of an ISBN-10 value.
        Returns:
        True if isbn represents a legal ISBN-10 value, False otherwise.
        Throws:
        java.io.CharConversionException - If the method fails to calculate the ISBN-10 value's correct checksum value.

      • calculateISBN10CheckSum

        public static int calculateISBN10CheckSum(java.lang.String isbn)
                                   throws java.io.CharConversionException
        Parameters:
        isbn - A string representation of an ISBN-10 value.
        Returns:
        The checksum for the provided ISBN-10 as an integer ranging from 0 to 10.
        Throws:
        java.io.CharConversionException - If the method is unable to generate a numeric value for any digit found in the ISBN-10 string.

      • validateISBN13

        public static boolean validateISBN13(java.lang.String isbn)
        Parameters:
        isbn - A string representation of an ISBN-13 value.
        Returns:
        True if isbn represents a legal ISBN-13 value, False otherwise.
        Throws:
        java.io.CharConversionException - If the method is unable to generate a numeric value for any digit found in the ISBN-13 string.

      • calculateISBN13CheckSum

        public static int calculateISBN13CheckSum(java.lang.String isbn)
                                   throws java.io.CharConversionException
        Parameters:
        isbn - A string representation of an ISBN-13 value.
        Returns:
        The checksum for the provided ISBN-13 as an integer ranging from 0 to 9.
        Throws:
        java.io.CharConversionException - If the method is unable to generate a numeric value for any digit found in the ISBN-13 string.
